question: Which of the following was the location of the event "1921 Persian coup d'etat"?
explanation: Tehran, the capital of Iran, was the location of the event "1921 Persian coup d'etat". 1921 Persian coup d'etat, known in Iran as 3 Esfand 1299 coup d'etat, refers to several major events in Persia in 1921, which eventually led to the establishment of the Pahlavi dynasty as the ruling house of the country in 1925.
